狾字的基本解释

狾
zhì
狂：狾狗（狂犬）。

狾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhì］
［《廣韻》征例切，去祭，章。］
狂犬。亦谓狗疯狂。

狾字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　狾； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页712第04
【唐韻】【集韻】?征例切，音制。【說文】狂犬也。【前漢·五行志】宋國人逐狾犬。【集韻】或作猘瘈。○按《說文》引《春秋傳》曰：狾犬入華臣氏之門。今本《左傳·襄十七年》傳作瘈狗。　又【集韻】居例切，音罽。本作猘。或作瘈??。又【集韻】【類篇】?尺制切，音掣。或作??。又【集韻】吉詣切，音計。本作猘。義?同。

狾字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
狾字的起名意思

暂无。

狾
zhì
Mad: Bad dog (rabid dog).
狾
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhì］
["Guangyun" case cut, go to sacrifice, chapter. ]
Rabies. It's also called dog madness.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 2] [Dog Character Department] 　狾; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 712 04
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Case cut, phonetic system. [Said the text] Rabies too. [Previous Han·Five Elements] The people of Song Dynasty chased the dogs. 【Ji Yun】or 猘猘猘瘈. ○According to "Shuowen" to quote "Chun Qiu Zhuan", it says: The lean dog enters the gate of Watson's. Today's "Zuo Zhuan·Xiangsi Seventeen Years" is passed down as a crippled dog.　[Jiyun] Jueqi cut, sound 罽. This is a rabid. Or make a pang??. Also [Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? Ruler system cutting, sound switch. Or as ??. Also 【Jiyun】Quijiu cut, sound meter. This is a rabid. Righteous? Same.
